TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:

> 4 minutes ago, CobaltWolf said:
> 
> 
> What is it
> 

Its the KSP Soon™ countdown clock  

Displays time to when every mod will ever be updated, and KSP itself...  

When someone aske "When is the next update/release?"... Just reference them to that lil bad boy...  

Basically the [THIS](https://www.google.com/search?q=magic+8+ball&num=30&newwindow=1&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjt9ay57rnPAhXLVj4KHezABGgQ_AUICSgC&biw=1398&bih=709) for KSP ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

[@Tristonwilson12](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/136353-tristonwilson12/) The thread has been re-opened, does this mean you're back working on it? if so, I was wondering if I could get some information on what size the Space Shuttle Landing Facility is compared to the stock <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> ksp runway?<font face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"> Also any chance you will add an album to the front page, this looks really nice from the few pics I've seen, I'm going through the 50 pages to see images. Sorry to flood in with questions as soon as the thread is re-opened, I don't mean to be annoying, I'm just really interested. I work on extreme visuals for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr></font> [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=78gcIrSBZ74), and will be opening my own page soon, so I'll get to experience a load of questions as well. Cheers.
